title: Case Management
description: Comprehensive legal case management from creation to completion
overview: The Case Management module serves as the central hub for all your legal cases. It provides tools to track case progress, manage documents, schedule hearings, monitor SLA compliance, and collaborate with team members. Whether you're handling a simple consultation or a complex litigation, this module ensures nothing falls through the cracks.

keyFeatures.title: Case Lifecycle Management
keyFeatures.description: Track cases through predefined legal stages with automated validation and requirement checking

keyFeatures.title: Timeline & Milestones
keyFeatures.description: Visual timeline showing case history, key events, and upcoming deadlines

keyFeatures.title: SLA Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Monitor compliance deadlines, court dates, and regulatory requirements with automated alerts

keyFeatures.title: Team Collaboration
keyFeatures.description: Assign tasks, share updates, and communicate with team members in real-time

keyFeatures.title: Document Integration
keyFeatures.description: Seamlessly link case documents, correspondence, and evidence to specific cases

keyFeatures.title: AI Assistant
keyFeatures.description: Get intelligent suggestions for case strategy, document drafting, and legal research
